content:
I'm trying to eliminate the user-enabled account creation through sign-up. I want people to manually send me an email, and I create the account from my admin account or CLI based on my personal determination.

I'm using the Dockerized version.

Is it even possible; and if yes, how do I do that?
@infracritical hi! It should be possible! Please see https://guides.dataverse.org/en/6.7/installation/config.html#allowsignup
